channel.title: Cookie Thread v3.0 - Random poster before post 5000 gets a cookie
channel.description:
:cookie:
Look at it Don't you want that cookie?
**[Original thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/54321st-poster-gets-a-cookie/266)** **ORIGINAL Winners**: 1. Shurian - Post 1000 2. Tw1light- Post 2000 3. Memesky - Post 3000 4. Firekitten - Post 4000 5. Boss110 - Post 5000 6. MaximusPrime - Post 10000 7. Hjasik - Post 11111 8. Hjasik - Post 12345 9. Alice - Post 13371 10. Datbird - Post 15000 11. WazzaAzza - Post 16969 12. H_Hja - Post 17777 13. Marshal - Post 20000 14. Arete - Post 22222 15. Luxy - Post 24816 16. Discobot - Post 26969 17. Simon - Post 30000 18. Marshal - Post 33333 19. Sulit - Post 36963 20. Chloe - Post 40000 21. Stolen by the void - Post 42069 22. Chloe - Post 44444 23. Marshal - Post 45678 24. Emelia - Post 50000
[**Cookie Thread v2.0**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/last-poster-before-threadlock-gets-a-cookie-cookie-thread-v2/81317?u=datbird) 1. Marshal - Post 1000 2. Italy - Post 4321 - Special Prize: Hug 3. Jane - Post 6969 4. katze - Post 9999 5. CRichard564 - 13337 6. blackandorange6 - 13509 7. Italy - 16161 8. Arete - 20001 9. Vulgood - 24601 10. Marshal - 27182 11. Italy - 30003 12. katze - 33333 13. Priestess - 37373 14. N.1 - 42069 15. Italy - 45678 16. Amelia- Threadlock
Cookie Thread v3.0 1. ????? - 1000

item.title: Cookie Thread v3.0 - Random poster before post 5000 gets a cookie
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
btw gamers here’s a PSA

Most of us are talking on the server in @Simon’s profile. It’s unofficial but it has a lot of channels (consider them like threads) and we do cool things in there

It’s kind of the de-facto off-topic and is very personalized for FoL people and FoL people’s needs

We have gay rights and fredboat and wolfia

This isn’t trying to say like that you shouldn’t go on official server or anything, it’s just where a lot of us are hanging out in the absence of off-topic and we’d love to see y’all there

I have an inv link below too but if it’s expired just click the one in ami’s profile

Discord

Discord - A New Way to Chat with Friends & Communities

Discord is the easiest way to communicate over voice, video, and text. Chat, hang out, and stay close with your friends and communities.

Read full topic
